resources.string: An internal error occurred. Please try again later.

You are currently using the free version of "App Name". Upgrading to "App Name+" unlocks the following benefits: 

 - Removes all ads. 
 - Allows you to change your forum location. 
 - Allows you to adjust the distance from your set location you receive content from. 
 - Allows you to save multiple locations, and easily switch between them. 
 - Allows you to view and edit all of your past posts.

We are constantly working to improve our user experience, and apologize for any issues you are experiencing while using \"App Name\". \n\nPlease send your help/ support request to support@appname.com. We will be in touch within 1â€“3 business days.
Sorry, you cannot view your previous posts in the base version of \'App Name\". Please upgrade to \"App name+\" to unlock this feature.
Sorry, you cannot view or change your location in the base version of \'App Name\". Please upgrade to \"App name+\" to unlock this feature.

Sorry, you need to upgrade to use with the map. You are currently using the free version of Anon. Upgrading to Anon+ unlocks the following benefits: 

 - Removes all ads. 
 - Allows you to change your forum location. 
 - Allows you to adjust the distance you receive content from. 
 - Allows you to save multiple locations, and easily switch between them. 
 - Allows you to view and edit all of your past posts.
Access to the location service is required to retrieve and display the proper content.

This app requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'App Name\'.
Location permission is required for this app.
